4:
--------------------
Text: Lady Rachel Workman MacRobert:  She married Sir Alexander MacRobert, a wealthy self-made Scottish millionaire, and had three sons with him.
Triplets:<Lady Rachel Workman MacRobert
5:
--------------------
Text: Lady Rachel Workman MacRobert:  He was endowed with a knighthood in 1910 and a baronetcy in 1922 but died later that year.

Triplets:<Lady Rachel Workman MacRobert
6:
--------------------
Text: Lady Rachel Workman MacRobert:  Lady Rachel's sons all pre-deceased her – the eldest in a flying accident in 1938, and the other two died in action during the Second World War serving with the Royal Air Force.
Triplets:<Lady Rachel Workman MacRobert
